institution_name: Navy Federal Credit Union – Paycheck Assistance
offer_summary: 0% APR paycheck assistance (bridge loan) for eligible members when a federal shutdown is imminent or underway.
who_qualifies: NFCU members with qualifying recent direct deposit of federal/military pay per program rules.

offer_summary: Zero-interest loans for eligible members and account relief; applications announced on USAA site/app when active.
who_qualifies: USAA members affected by a federal shutdown (see eligibility when program opens).

offer_summary: Skip-a-payment and individualized hardship options during shutdowns.
who_qualifies: PenFed members; options vary by product and situation.

offer_summary: Dedicated support line for customers affected by a shutdown (mortgage, card, auto, business, deposit assistance).
who_qualifies: Chase customers impacted by a federal shutdown.

institution_name: American Bankers Association – Bank Assistance Tracker
offer_summary: Tracker of banks offering fee waivers, deferrals, and emergency loans during shutdowns.
who_qualifies: Customers of listed banks; terms vary by institution.

institution_name: Credit Union National Association – Relief Roundups
offer_summary: State credit union leagues and participating credit unions offering skip-a-pay and emergency loans during shutdowns.
who_qualifies: Members of participating credit unions.

offer_summary: $150 micro-grants to help lower-salary federal employees with essentials during a shutdown (application window opens during events).
who_qualifies: Eligible federal employees meeting FEEA criteria (income/status).

offer_summary: Hardship benefits for eligible union members (mortgage assistance, personal loan hardship options, grants).
who_qualifies: AFGE/Union Plus eligible members; terms vary by program.

offer_summary: Resource hub for NTEU members: benefits, FAQs, and aid links during shutdowns.
who_qualifies: NTEU members and represented employees.

offer_summary: Rapid no-interest loans/grants addressing missed pay; guidance published each shutdown.
who_qualifies: Eligible Soldiers/families per AER rules.

institution_name: Coast Guard Mutual Assistance – Shutdown Loans
offer_summary: Interest-free loans for rent, utilities, food, childcare during a shutdown.
who_qualifies: Eligible Coast Guard members/civilians and families.

offer_summary: FEHB/FEGLI continue; missed premiums collected after pay resumes. Official furlough/benefits guidance.
who_qualifies: All affected federal employees.

offer_summary: Contributions and match pause in non-pay; account remains active; loans/withdrawals follow normal rules.
who_qualifies: TSP participants in non-pay due to shutdown.

offer_summary: Find your state’s UCFE application portal; repayment rules may apply if back pay is later awarded.
who_qualifies: Furloughed federal employees; contractors vary by state.

offer_summary: Apply for UCFE with Alabama's workforce agency; repayment may be required if you later receive back pay.
who_qualifies: Furloughed federal employees in Alabama.

offer_summary: 211 connects residents to local housing, food, utility assistance, and emergency resources (including during shutdowns).
who_qualifies: Residents of Alabama seeking essential service support.

institution_name: Feeding America – Alabama Food Bank Network
offer_summary: Locate food banks and pantries serving your area via Feeding America’s national locator.
who_qualifies: Individuals and families needing food assistance.

offer_summary: Help with home energy bills through the Low Income Home Energy Assistance Program (LIHEAP). Apply with your state/local office.
who_qualifies: Income-eligible households in Alabama; eligibility varies by state/local guidelines.

offer_summary: Free/low-cost counseling for budgeting, foreclosure prevention, and rental issues; counselors can help during missed pay.
who_qualifies: Residents of Alabama; services available regardless of lender/landlord.

offer_summary: Apply for SNAP (food assistance) with your state agency; some states provide expedited service for no-income households.
who_qualifies: Eligible households in Alabama as determined by state agency.

offer_summary: Apply for UCFE with Alaska's workforce agency; repayment may be required if you later receive back pay.
who_qualifies: Furloughed federal employees in Alaska.
